com.iha.emulator.server

Class Worker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iha.emulator.server.Worker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class serving request from one client. Ran in separate thread, so server can accept more connections while this is processed.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky

    • Constructor Detail

      • Worker

        public Worker(java.net.Socket clientSocket,
      DatabaseInfo dbInfo)
        Creates new worker responsible for receiving and processing client request.
        Parameters:
        clientSocket - connected client socket
        dbInfo - information about database from configuration file

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Method reads message on client socket, processes this message and sends server's response. Afterwards is connection closed.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • parseMessage

        private java.lang.String parseMessage(java.lang.String clientMessageString)
        Parse XML message given as string.
        Parameters:
        clientMessageString - XML message content
        Returns:
        server's response in XML format as string

      • parseXml

        private java.lang.String parseXml(java.lang.String clientMessageString)
                           throws org.dom4j.DocumentException
        Parse given XML content, creates new DatabaseInfo from one created from configuration file and inserts database name parsed from message. Creates and resolves EmulatorServer Task.
        Parameters:
        clientMessageString - message from client in XML format
        Returns:
        server's response in XML format as string
        Throws:
        org.dom4j.DocumentException

      • buildMessage

        private java.lang.String buildMessage(org.dom4j.Element result)
        Wraps task result in default element
        Parameters:
        result - task's result
        Returns:
        response ready to be sent to client

      • serverErrorMessage

        private java.lang.String serverErrorMessage(java.lang.String error)
        When error on server occurs, error message is created. This message is ready to be sent to client. This is global server error, not specific task error.
        Parameters:
        error - error message for client
        Returns:
        error message ready to be sent to client
